message:
SYSTEM: ThesisCarlos3rdYear.pdf: Página 5
Introduction
• Currently there are only a few approaches to federate 
SPARQL queries
• DARQ (Cyganiak 2006)
• SemWIQ (Langegger, iiWAS2008)
• Networked Graphs (Staab WWW2008)
• Executing SPARQL Queries over the Web of Linked Data 
(Hartig, Bizer, Freytag, ISWC09)
• Problems from the previous approaches
• They implement a basic system for optimising SPARQL 
queries
• They do not take into account neither blank nodes nor 
complexity
• They do not implement many optimisation methods
speaker: SYSTEM
